objectif.title: Objective
objectif.text: Summer internship (3.5 months) in applications development (back-end), security, design/deployment/administration/migration of databases.

small_components.title: Languages
array: English: fluent (TOEIC: 935/990, several trips to UK, English father)

elements.text: Computer Science engineering diploma, INSA de Lyon Graduate School, Lyon, France (4th year, Master's level)
Erasmus semester in Denmark at the Via University in Horsens
Technical Degree in computer science, IUT Illkirch, France
Scientific Baccalaureat (High School Diploma), Strasbourg, France
Internship at Axopen, participation in 4 different projects:
list: Bouyers: development of the settings page for a sound level measurement machine with the Angular framework.
Axopen's website: creation of pages for the official Axopen website in PHP/HTML/CSS (Wordpress).
Sport dans la ville (Sport in the town): creation of the registration/modification page for teenagers with the Angular framework.

elements.text: Summer job for the city of Strasbourg
Delivery of the municipal news bulletin for a town hall
C#, Java, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySql, Materialize (CSS), Bootstrap (CSS), Angular (JS), Adobe Premier Pro, Word office suite
PL/SQL, C, NodeJs, ReactJs, NextJs, Adobe Photoshop, Blender, Unity, Laravel (PHP)
Secretary of the algorithms INSAlgo association (organisation of algorithm contest like Le Shaker)
Hackathons (“hacking industry camp”, “the night of the info”,”24h of the IUT”)
Volunteer in the video editing team for the amateur full length movie Edhalion
Volunteer in the organisation team of the annual theque competition (French baseball, 400 young participants)
